name.baseName: White wet fur (fine miscellaneous fur) - finished fur ; Finished fur ; White wet fur (fine mixed skin) ; Chromium retanning ; All sizes; NESPS2
白湿毛皮(细杂皮)—成品毛皮 ; 成品毛皮 ; 白湿毛皮（细杂皮） ; 铬复鞣 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及白湿毛皮（细杂皮）的生产和加工处理，其中采用铬复鞣工艺。这种材料用于制造成品毛皮产品。末端污染管理技术旨在治疗工艺过程中生成的各种污染物，包括铬、磷、氨氮、有机结合氮、化学需氧量和悬浮固体。这些处理对于从事毛皮生产和加工的工业设施至关重要，确保符合环境保护法规。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1931文件，在完整版文件中第2756页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ChromiumisSedimentation method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标铬的末端治理技术是沉淀法，其效率为96，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为铬，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management83，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理处理法，其效率为83，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Suspended solids, unspecifiedisSpray tower/water shock bath，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
